findings: The rear tires have 6/32" of tread depth, and the front tires have 8/32" of tread depth.
The rear brake pads have 1 mm of thickness remaining.
Rotors require replacement as they have hot spots and grooves.
The voltage surface monitor is on.
The cabin filter is reported to be dirty.

Replace rear pads, rotors and sensor. Rotors are worn and have grooves and hot spots.
Throttle plate service. Recommended with air filter replacement. To remove carbon deposits from throttle plate.
Perform a/c deodorizing and disinfecting. Recommended with filter replacement.
Service maintenance required warning is on. Recommend oil change. Reset service indicator.
Brake flush. Recommended with brake replacement. Remove air and moisture from system.
